title: Looking for Gold/Plat players from season 4 and willing to start a semi serious ranked team??
body:
Hi I'm Frost09 and I have recently been getting really frustrated with solo queue, I will still play ranked but I would also like to start up a team. I'm currently looking for people in gold and plat low diamond and high silver can still try out although high diamond and low silver have a large difference. But preferably gold/plat, I'm not going to make a massive thread post as we can talk more when I add you in game. How ever I wouldn't mind if you could fill in a few details so I know a bit about you.

Ign: 
Age:
Season 4 rank and season 5 if you have already done them:
Current champion pool and maybe some that your learning:
Current primary role:
Current secondary role:
Current third role (optional):
Skype:
Goals:
Availability:
Lolking link profile if possible:

replies.body:
Ign: ColdBlood
Age: 21
Season 4 rank and season 5 if you have already done them: Gold III
Current champion pool and maybe some that your learning: Can play all support and top champs including meta and some special picks ( {{champion:98}} ) also have a penchant for alot of jungle champions
Current primary role: Top
Current secondary role: Support
Current third role (optional): Jungle
Skype: quarmby2
Goals: Semi Serious team to play ranked with without raging
Availability: every night
Lolking link profile if possible: http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/222330

**Ign:** StarFall/Star/Ally
**Age:** 21
**Season 2 rank:** silver (1495 elo)
**Season 3 rank:** g1
**Season 4 rank:** g2/p3/g2
** and season 5:** n/a (season 5 starts on the 21st)
**Highest achieved elo:** Diamond 5 64 LP
**Current champion pool (for my main role):** Ahri {{champion:103}} , LeBlanc {{champion:7}} , Fizz{{champion:105}} 
**and maybe some that your learning/planning on learning:** Syndra, Ori, Zed
**Current primary role:** Mid
**Current secondary role:** ADC ({{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:236}} 
**Current third role (optional):** Support {{champion:40}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:412}} 
**Skype:** Yes
**Goals:** Self improvement
**Availability:** Nights EST around 8pm and all weekends. 
**Lolking link profile if possible:** StarFall http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/329847
Star http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/1840493
Ally http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/450074
HEY guys somehow I have managed to be able to play today so in like an hour if you guys want we can do sometrialing

> [{quoted}](name=Frost09,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=MIAPlElt,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-01-17T07:27:44.063+0000)
>
> HEY guys somehow I have managed to be able to play today so in like an hour if you guys want we can do sometrialing

Add me on league IGN: yueyangxiaoyyx

IGN: YueyangXiaoyyx
Role: AD Marksman Main but play all other roles.
Rank: Gold 5 (peaked Gold 2)
Main Champions: Vayne/Lucian/J4
How long have you played: I have played on and off since open beta, I have Quit many time in-between but have been playing a lot since season 3. I peaked Plat 4 on NA and Gold 2 on OCE.
What specific skill can you offer to our team: I am a all-rounder player I guess and I have been told I play extremely aggressively which in some cases is very rewarding but I really play from that.
What are your strengths and weaknesses when it comes to playing a game of LOL: I am good mechanical but am not the best decision maker, I may not be the best player in every game but I coop with team well.
Can you take constructive criticism well and learn form it: Yes, I like it when people tell me what I am doing wrong and it helps me improve, tell me is a lot better then not because I take comments from my team seriously.
Are you available at least 4 nights a week and which nights: For now everyday and night, but will change to Friday, Saturday, Sunday, Tuesday.

Ign: Azkaellion
Age: 18
Season 4 rank and season 5 if you have already done them: Gold 5 S4

Current champion pool and maybe some that your learning: {{champion:267}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:18}} 

Current primary role: Support

Current secondary role: Jungle

Current third role (optional): AD Carry

Skype: Yes, add in game for details

Goals: I believe that I can play at a mid Plat level from my normal MMR, and  hope to prove it by grinding some ranked over my upcoming holidays. I've played in a couple of casual ranked 5 teams last season for the ward skin, and I found it far more enjoyable than solo queue and am keen to continue!

Availability: Roughly 6-9 PM every day (NZ time), on very frequently over the weekends.

Lolking link profile if possible:  http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/315520

Ign: A Wild Skarlak

Previous Rank: Gold 4 Season 4, Was with a Gold 1 Team
Current Champion Pool: {{champion:28}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:113}}

Other roles: Have none, But willing to learn and am decent at most.
Skype: Not making it public sorry. If you want it add me in game and ask :x

Availability: 90% of the time, 3 nights a week I cant make between 8-11 PM on Wednesday, Thursday and Sunday.
lolking link: http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/551759

I'd like to have fun, but be taken seriously

would love to chat with you
Going to add you in game and we can talk form there :)

Thank you for wanting to be apart of the team you will be on the team and will add you on the 19th I'm still not sure what role we might give you although I main ADC you could possibly be ADC sub and jungle main if that's ok with you??
